title: BBC News - Breaking news, video and the latest top stories from the U.S. and around the world
prompt:
==== Prompt for NEWS Rewriter AI =======

You are an expert News Analyst and Multilingual Content Specialist. Your task is to process the raw news article content below and structure the output into a specific JSON format, adhering strictly to all extraction, formatting, and translation rules.

[b]--- INPUT DATA ---[/b]
[b]Article Title:[/b] BBC News - Breaking news, video and the latest top stories from the U.S. and around the world
[b]Article Date:[/b] 2025-11-19
[b]Source URL:[/b] https://www.bbc.com/news
[b]Raw Content (JINA AI Scrape):[/b]
BBC News - Breaking news, video and the latest top stories from the U.S. and around the world

===============

[b]--- PROCESSING & OUTPUT RULES ---[/b]
1.  **Extraction & Filtering (Sniper Mode):** Extract ONLY the information directly related to the [b]Article Title[/b] and the core news content. [b]You MUST exclude ALL extraneous text, website boilerplate, advertisements, navigation, or generic filler text.[/b]
2.  **English Summarization:** Condense the extracted crucial information into clear, easy-to-understand point form for the `news content (en)` field.
3.  **BBcode Formatting (English Only):** Apply BBcode to the English summary:
    * Highlight key entities/numbers: Use `[color=yellow]`
    * Bold major points: Use `[b]`
    * Color the summary title: Use `[color=orange]`
    * [b]Example Format for news content (en):[/b] [b][color=orange]SUMMARY OF: TITLE[/color][/b]
[b]---[/b]
* [b]Point 1:[/b] [color=yellow]Key detail[/color].
4.  **Translation:** Provide accurate, natural translations of the English summary (point form) for the `news content (zh-cn)` (Simplified Chinese) and `news content (my)` (Bahasa Melayu) fields. [b]Do NOT use BBcode in the translated fields.[/b]
5.  **Tagging:** Select exactly [b]3 tags[/b] from the following list that are most relevant to the news content: [b]solar, wind, battery, policy, malaysia, asean, china, us, euro, renewable[/b].
6.  **No Emojis:** You MUST NOT use any emojis, symbols, or graphical characters in the final output.
7.  **Final Output:** Produce the final result as a single, valid JSON object following the structure below.

[b]Required JSON Output Structure:[/b]
```json
{
  "news title": "BBC News - Breaking news, video and the latest top stories from the U.S. and around the world",
  "news date": "2025-11-19",
  "news source url": "https://www.bbc.com/news",
  "news content (en)": "--- ENGLISH SUMMARY WITH BBCODE ---",
  "news content (zh-cn)": "--- 简体中文翻译 (Point Form) ---",
  "news content (my)": "--- Terjemahan Bahasa Melayu (Point Form) ---",
  "tags (pick 3)": [
    "tag1",
    "tag2",
    "tag3"
  ]
}
```

===============================

The content above has already been scraped via the Jina Reader API and returned as Markdown. Your output will be passed to the next GPT-5-nano stage, so make sure all rules are followed exactly.

message.content:
{
  "news title": "BBC News - Breaking news, video and the latest top stories from the U.S. and around the world",
  "news date": "2025-11-19",
  "news source url": "https://www.bbc.com/news",
  "news content (en)": "[b][color=orange]SUMMARY OF: BBC News - Breaking news, video and the latest top stories from the U.S. and around the world[/color][/b]

* [b]Point 1:[/b] [color=yellow]A Russian strike on western Ukraine killed 25 people, including children, hitting two apartment blocks in Ternopil.[/color].
* [b]Point 2:[/b] [color=yellow]US Congress votes to send Epstein files bill to Trump; the DOJ will have 30 days to release the materials after he signs it.[/color].
* [b]Point 3:[/b] [color=yellow]Trump defends Saudi crown prince over Khashoggi killing; he says the prince 'knew nothing', contradicting the CIA assessment.[/color].
* [b]Point 4:[/b] [color=yellow]Curacao becomes the smallest nation to qualify for the World Cup after drawing with Jamaica.[/color].
* [b]Point 5:[/b] [color=yellow]Larry Summers resigns from the OpenAI board after Epstein emails were made public.[/color].
* [b]Point 6:[/b] [color=yellow]Russian spy ship pointed lasers at RAF pilots; UK defence secretary says the Navy's rules for tracking the vessel have been updated.[/color].",
  "news content (zh-cn)": "[b][color=orange]SUMMARY OF: BBC News - Breaking news, video and the latest top stories from the U.S. and around the world[/color][/b]

- 第1点：俄罗斯对乌克兰西部的一次袭击造成25人死亡，其中包括儿童，袭击了特尔诺皮尔市的两幢公寓楼。
- 第2点：美国国会通过一项法案，将 Epstein 档案交给特朗普；总统签署后，司法部将有30天时间发布相关材料。
- 第3点：特朗普为沙特王储在卡舒吉案中辩解，称王储“毫不知情”，这与 CIA 的评估相矛盾。
- 第4点：库拉索成为世界杯历史上最小的参赛国，在与牙买加平局后获得世界杯参赛资格。
- 第5点：拉里·萨默斯从OpenAI董事会辞职，原因是 Epstein 邮件曝光。
- 第6点：俄罗斯间谍船向英国皇家空军飞行员发射激光，英国国防大臣表示海军追踪该舰的规定已更新。",
  "news content (my)": "[b][color=orange]SUMMARY OF: BBC News - Breaking news, video and the latest top stories from the U.S. and around the world[/color][/b]

- Perkara 1: Serangan Rusia di barat Ukraine mengorbankan 25 orang termasuk kanak-kanak, dengan dua blok pangsapuri di bandar Ternopil.
- Perkara 2: Kongres AS meluluskan rang undang-undang untuk menghantar fail Epstein kepada Trump; DOJ mempunyai 30 hari selepas tandatangan untuk melepaskan bahan.
- Perkara 3: Trump mempertahankan putera mahkota Saudi berhubung pembunuhan Khashoggi; mendakwa bahawa putera mahkota 'tidak tahu apa-apa', bertentangan dengan penilaian CIA.
- Perkara 4: Curacao menjadi negara terkecil yang layak ke Piala Dunia selepas seri dengan Jamaica.
- Perkara 5: Larry Summers mengundurkan diri dari lembaga OpenAI selepas emel Epstein didedahkan.
- Perkara 6: Kapal perisik Rusia mengarahkan laser ke juruterbang RAF; Menteri Pertahanan UK berkata peraturan penjejakan kapal telah dikemas kini.",
  "tags (pick 3)": [
    "us",
    "euro",
    "policy"
  ]
}

- Perkara 3: Trump mempertahankan putera mahkota Saudi berhubung pembunuhan Khashoggi; mendakwa bahawa putera mahkota 'tidak tahu apa-apa', bertentangan dengan penilaian CIA.
- Perkara 4: Curacao menjadi negara terkecil yang layak ke Piala Dunia selepas seri dengan Jamaica.
- Perkara 5: Larry Summers mengundurkan diri dari lembaga OpenAI selepas emel Epstein didedahkan.
- Perkara 6: Kapal perisik Rusia mengarahkan laser ke juruterbang RAF; Menteri Pertahanan UK berkata peraturan penjejakan kapal telah dikemas kini.",

parsed_json.news title: BBC News - Breaking news, video and the latest top stories from the U.S. and around the world
parsed_json.news content (en):
[b][color=orange]SUMMARY OF: BBC News - Breaking news, video and the latest top stories from the U.S. and around the world[/color][/b]

* [b]Point 1:[/b] [color=yellow]A Russian strike on western Ukraine killed 25 people, including children, hitting two apartment blocks in Ternopil.[/color].
* [b]Point 2:[/b] [color=yellow]US Congress votes to send Epstein files bill to Trump; the DOJ will have 30 days to release the materials after he signs it.[/color].
* [b]Point 3:[/b] [color=yellow]Trump defends Saudi crown prince over Khashoggi killing; he says the prince 'knew nothing', contradicting the CIA assessment.[/color].
* [b]Point 4:[/b] [color=yellow]Curacao becomes the smallest nation to qualify for the World Cup after drawing with Jamaica.[/color].
* [b]Point 5:[/b] [color=yellow]Larry Summers resigns from the OpenAI board after Epstein emails were made public.[/color].
* [b]Point 6:[/b] [color=yellow]Russian spy ship pointed lasers at RAF pilots; UK defence secretary says the Navy's rules for tracking the vessel have been updated.[/color].
parsed_json.news content (zh-cn):
[b][color=orange]SUMMARY OF: BBC News - Breaking news, video and the latest top stories from the U.S. and around the world[/color][/b]

- 第1点：俄罗斯对乌克兰西部的一次袭击造成25人死亡，其中包括儿童，袭击了特尔诺皮尔市的两幢公寓楼。
- 第2点：美国国会通过一项法案，将 Epstein 档案交给特朗普；总统签署后，司法部将有30天时间发布相关材料。
- 第3点：特朗普为沙特王储在卡舒吉案中辩解，称王储“毫不知情”，这与 CIA 的评估相矛盾。
- 第4点：库拉索成为世界杯历史上最小的参赛国，在与牙买加平局后获得世界杯参赛资格。
- 第5点：拉里·萨默斯从OpenAI董事会辞职，原因是 Epstein 邮件曝光。
- 第6点：俄罗斯间谍船向英国皇家空军飞行员发射激光，英国国防大臣表示海军追踪该舰的规定已更新。
parsed_json.news content (my):
[b][color=orange]SUMMARY OF: BBC News - Breaking news, video and the latest top stories from the U.S. and around the world[/color][/b]

- Perkara 1: Serangan Rusia di barat Ukraine mengorbankan 25 orang termasuk kanak-kanak, dengan dua blok pangsapuri di bandar Ternopil.
- Perkara 2: Kongres AS meluluskan rang undang-undang untuk menghantar fail Epstein kepada Trump; DOJ mempunyai 30 hari selepas tandatangan untuk melepaskan bahan.
- Perkara 3: Trump mempertahankan putera mahkota Saudi berhubung pembunuhan Khashoggi; mendakwa bahawa putera mahkota 'tidak tahu apa-apa', bertentangan dengan penilaian CIA.
- Perkara 4: Curacao menjadi negara terkecil yang layak ke Piala Dunia selepas seri dengan Jamaica.
- Perkara 5: Larry Summers mengundurkan diri dari lembaga OpenAI selepas emel Epstein didedahkan.
- Perkara 6: Kapal perisik Rusia mengarahkan laser ke juruterbang RAF; Menteri Pertahanan UK berkata peraturan penjejakan kapal telah dikemas kini.
